modShortDescription: With this 7DTD mod turn to small rocks then regrow after 5 Days. All types of material boulders!
modDescription:
With this 7DTD mod turn to small rocks then regrow after 5 Days. All types of material boulders!

* The regrowth rate is set to 180.
* Small rock is planted when any type of boulder resource is used up and can be broken if needed to clear the area.
* Boulders, lead, shale, coal, potassium nitrate, iron

**[Download](https://botmanhosting.com/A18/HH_Boulders_Respawn.zip)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/11963-highopes-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Highope](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/highope/)
